com.aurel.track.item.consInf

Class ConsInfBL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.item.consInf.ConsInfBL

  • public class ConsInfBL
extends java.lang.Object
    Business logic class for "load", "delete" and "me" operations related to consultants/informants Deals with consultants/informants for new issues (managed in session) and existing issues (managed in database)
